name: The Pride of South Bastule
description:
A very short, text-based game written in Python. Internet connection required.

Should work across Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Source code repo

Dependencies
  • Python 3:
    • webvtt
    • youtubesearchpython
  • Other:
    • youtube-dl
How to play

From a terminal, navigate to the installation directory, then run "python3 main.py"
